mapper.select: select p_no, p_name, substr(p_birth,1,4)||'년'||substr(p_birth,5,2)||'월'||substr(p_birth,7,2)||'일' as p_birth, case p_gender when 'M' then '남' else '여' end as p_gender, p_tel1||'-'||p_tel2||'-'||p_tel3 as p_phone from tbl_patient_202004 p

select p_city, case p_city when '10' then '서울' when '20' then '경기' when '30' then '강원' when '40' then '대구' end as p_cityName, count(p_city) as p_cityCnt from tbl_patient_202004 group by p_city order by p_city
